getContextCodeFlexUsageCodeMap

public static java.util.ArrayList<EFFContextFlexFieldUsageBean> getContextCodeFlexUsageCodeMap(OAApplicationModuleImpl flexAM,
                                                                                               java.lang.Long applicationId,
                                                                                               java.lang.String descriptiveFlexfieldCode,
                                                                                               boolean partialDeployment)
APPLCORE INTERNAL USAGE : NOT FOR PUBLIC CONSUMPTION gets context code, flex usagecode map for Context Modeler.Queries the table FND_EF_CATEGORY_CONTEXTS and get distinct list of all contexts, that are associated to categories for the current DescriptiveFlexfieldCode - {c1, c2, .... cn).For each context in {c1,c2..cn} there will be a mapping with any of the flex field usages {f1,f2...fn} in the table FND_EF_CONTEXT_USAGES - get the distinct mapped list {c1f4,c2f3....cmfn} If partialDeployment is true, the api evaluates and returns the context code map for only the contexts which need to be redeployed. If partialDeployment is true, the api evaluates and returns the context code map for only the contexts which need to be redeployed.

Parameters:
applicationId - application ID
descriptiveFlexfieldCode - flexfield code
partialDeployment - is partial deployment mode
Returns:
ContextCodeFlexUsageCodeMap a map of Contextcode Usage mapping

public static long getEFFDeploymentCategoriesCount(java.lang.String extensibleFlexfieldCode,
                                                   java.lang.Long applicationId,
                                                   boolean changedCategoriesOnly,
                                                   DescriptiveFlexfieldServiceAMImpl am)
Applcore Internal usage Gives the number of categories affected by deployment for a given extensible flexfieldCode, applicationId.

Parameters:

applicationId -
changedCategoriesOnly -
Returns:
